title: Babylon 5 - A 35 Novel, Short Story, Guide, and Script Collection (1995-2001)
creator: J. Michael Straczynski
description: Other Babylon 5 listings are scattered few and far between-- Here I have found and compiled every single Babylon 5 Novel that exists outside of what seem to TV guides and RPG books (that's a project for another day) https://babylon5.fandom.com/wiki/Novel_list <-- was my reference point. 9 Standalone Novels (BB5-SA) 3 Psi Corps Trilogy (BB5-PCT) 3 Legion of Fire Trilogy (BB5-LOF) 3 Mongoose Publishing (BB5-MP) 2 Episode Novelizations (BB5-EN) 1 Movie Novelization (BB5-MN) 3 The Passing of the Techno-Mages trilogy (BB5-TM) That's 24 total novels, now preserved in one place. UPDATEs: 5/16/23: Added the first edition of "The A-Z of Babylon 5" UPDATE: 5/31/23: added 6 Magazine Short Stories (BB5-MSS) hand formatted into proper ebooks by a kind preserver elsewhere on the web, from the ancient (1999/2001) PDF webpage formats they existed in previously. UPDATE: 5/31/23 (again!): added the three unfilmed Crusade Scripts, 1x14, 1x15, and 1x22 also added Dining on Babylon 5: The Ultimate Collection of Space Station Cuisine
